A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining until you realize you just watched hours of pointless plot line\, for some unexplained reason the Rebel's went from being the super power of the Galaxy to a group of about 20 incompetents under Leah's leadership where running constantly is equated with wisdom\, Episode 9 has literally no draw or purpose to it\, and that all of Star Wars lore was flushed down the toilet. Other than this\, it was pretty entertaining.
